headline: Why Is Consolidated Edison, Inc. (ED) Among the Dividend Kings You Should Consider?
summary: We recently compiled a list of the Dividend Kings List: Top 15. In this article, we are going to take a look at where Consolidated Edison, Inc. (NYSE:ED) stands against the other dividend kings you should know about. Dividend Kings are a distinguished group of companies that have achieved at least 50 consecutive years of dividend […]
